forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 41. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
